topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55413bb16368721428230400#post_55413bb16368721428230400
Well tournament rules state you can't have more than three copies of a card per deck. considering Exodia has five parts that's fifteen parts altogether. And considering the tournament deck limit is a minimum of forty and a maximum of eighty...
